dcterms:description: A dataset of single view basketball scenes featuring many interactions between the ball and players, and low-contrasted backgrounds. It includes 280 basketball scenes captured in 30 different arenas, with images annotated for ball detection.
dcterms:title: The dataset of single view basketball scenes

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge J. Belongie
Lubomir D. Bourdev
Ross B. Girshick
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan
Piotr Dollar
C. Lawrence Zitnick
dcterms:description: The MS-COCO dataset is a large-scale dataset designed for object detection, segmentation, and captioning tasks, containing images of complex scenes with common objects in context.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO dataset
